trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Coral Springs
There were no other sightings in Coral Springs on or around March 7th 2009
divs: sighting detailshi... i have a few videos that i've taken over the previous couple of years that seem to be similar to other "ufo" videos i've seen on the internet. this past saturday, while outside with my video cam (canon optura 200) with 200 digital zoom, i focused on the moon. i'm certain, as are two other people i've shown the video to, that i video'd flashing\pulsating lights on the surface. i'm assuming it's a craft rather than some structure, as it would have been seen before. it must be tremendous in size. i video taped the same lights two times and approx 3 hrs apart. i'd like to know if you can recommend someone in south florida that is an expert in video analysis. someone that may be able to "clean-up" the video to provide a better image. if mufon is interested, i can burn the mini-vid to a cd and send it in to you. if you're interested, let me know where to send it. thanks....ek
Summary: Flashing/pulsating lights video-taped on the surface of the moon.
